creator: jkb@stian.freeserve.co.uk
text:
The GUI Test script is very useful, but does not currently include any items 
under the WorkBench.

It would be useful if it included some simple controllers for the Module 
controller to use, and the Proxy Server.

However, I've just discovered that WorkBench items don't seem to be 
saved/restored so that bug had better be fixed first ...!

GuiTest is for developers to view the guis of all JMeter elements easily - for
verification that things look right.  I'm not sure what you find it useful for,
but it's certainly not a bug that there isn't anything under the workbench.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
jkb@stian.freeserve.co.uk
text:
Agreed it is not really a bug.

However, without any SimpleController entries under WorkBench, the 
ModuleController does not display any entries in the drop-down list ...

I'm happy to contribute a patch - however, I cannot do so until bug 19761 is 
fixed ...
